383572421590007809.text: Bolshoy Ice Dome, a new venue for the Sochi International Investment Forum http://t.co/asCGNusO4y http://t.co/rgEPemAcCY

383570761836793857.text: Our development plans will not be effective unless implemented in the regions. Russia can only be strong if its regions are strong

383570539131830272.text: We must use human resources in the public sector more efficiently and stimulate later retirement of highly-skilled workers

383570183056400385.text: To support science and innovation, I think it expedient to cancel the import duties on materials and equipment needed for this research

383570001879257088.text: We plan to make greater use of development institutions' funds for implementing major infrastructure and regional projects #ForumSochi

383569543169208320.text: As proposed by businesses, a regional competition development standard is being drawn up in addition to the investment standard #SochiForum

383567956271058944.text: A year ago we decided to create regional investment standards to help the regions work with investors more efficiently

383567784887603200.text: Beginning 1 January 2014, at least 15% of the state order must be granted to small businesses and civil society organisations

383567624770052097.text: The Federal Guarantee Fund is being established to facilitate access to loans for SMEs #SochiForum

383567356812730368.text: The government prepares measures to protect retirement savings and to increase the returns on these investments #ForumSochi

383567069599375360.text: The new model of the economy must be based on three major principles: business freedom, innovations and effective public administration

383566692015542272.text: The government must pull out of areas where business and non-profits can do better. We should not hinder business development #ForumSochi

383566515842195456.text: We must be prepared to take difficult decisions, find other sources of growth, primarily in the private sector #ForumSochi

383565928908062720.text: We can no longer count on state demand, budget support and foreign markets to be the only sources of growth

383565735739396096.text: The government fully complies with its social obligations, public sector wages are rising, there are major investment projects #ForumSochi

383565515945291776.text: The economic slowdown is also due to the fact that production growth is mainly driven by the public sector

383565326085943296.text: The structure of Russia’s economy is the key factor behind slowing growth. Unfavourable commodity prices, except oil

383564941107539968.text: Many of the world’s economies are on the brink of recession. No one has been able to find a recipe for sustainable economic growth

383509834001154048.text: Regional heads, business leaders, government officials have come to #Sochi to discuss development prospects for Russia’s economy #ForumSochi

383509377493118977.text: Today in #Sochi we will discuss the development of Russia and the challenges it faces #ForumSochi

18450126537.text: Brought some rain to Belgorod. Helped a bit. But seriously, this drought is a major issue. Working on financial support for farmers.

18439313459.text: They also make sweets here. Tried some - I have a sweet tooth though it is not healthy.

18439236520.text: Toured a sunflower oil factory. This is a state-of-the-art facility producing competitive goods. We need more factories like this.

18439090373.text: Visited my great-grandparents' graves. In childhood I heard a lot from grandma about this area. My first visit here. A work trip, as always.

18439004832.text: Arrived in Alekseyevka. My grandmother was born here. We will hold a State Council Presidium meeting on agriculture.

18358492655.text: Being honest and open with the IAEA is, first of all, good for Iran itself.

18358201227.text: Iran may soon acquire nuclear capability. The Non-Proliferation Treaty doesn't prohibit having such capability. That's one of the problems.

18358008641.text: The Cold War is becoming a thing of the past, but we still need to get rid of a few lingering prejudices.

18357690324.text: Russia is certain to make a contribution to tackling global challenges on a par with the other leading economies.

18357439138.text: We need modernisation alliances, first of all with Germany, France, Italy, the EU and the United States.

18357282946.text: The main thing is that Russia and the US realise that sustained development rather than weapons or spy games underlies national security.

18357175917.text: Despite everything our relations with the US are very good, but we shouldn't miss a chance to make them even stronger.

18356872371.text: The world is currently divided in line with economic development rather than ideology. We must be on the same field as the key players.

18356747952.text: Foreign policy's main goal is to improve living standards, security and cultural progress and to foster the country's overall development.

18356689694.text: Had a big meeting with our ambassadors at the Foreign Ministry. A few thoughts on its results.

18346812415.text: Dozens of people were killed in terrorist bombings in Uganda. Deepest condolences to President Yoweri Museveni and families of the deceased.

18283530114.text: Today Spain and the Netherlands will decide who'll be the world football champion. It's sure to be a great game of strong teams. Good luck!

18200791121.text: CIS summit today in the Crimea. Very hot here: air temperature is 30 degrees Celsius, water temperature is 25, and we have to work again:).

17884694693.text: Police reports to the media and NGOs should be substantive rather than formal.

17884548463.text: Public feedback should become a critical factor in assessing how well the police are doing their job. This should be set forth in the law.

17883622132.text: The new law on the police force should be published, e.g. on the Interior Ministry's website. We need it to be discussed extensively.

17883370740.text: Any provisions that enable the Interior Ministry to arbitrarily restrict the rights of individuals and companies should be excluded.

17883238380.text: Work on a new law on the police force could go faster. Intend to submit it to the State Duma personally. This law is very important.

17786568277.text: For us, everything that is happening in Kyrgyzstan is not just events somewhere far away. They are our neighbours.

17775567650.text: The Customs Union Code for Russia, Kazakhstan and Belarus will come into force on July 6. It's an important step.

17716649987.text: Awarded Pacific Fleet sailors for courage against pirates. Russia will continue countering this threat. We will not sit by and do nothing.

17203801091.text: The environment matters. We will set an example and introduce a special law before the State Duma to protect our oceans from oil spills.

17203662199.text: I believe we must fight drug trafficking globally, not separately – in Afghanistan, Colombia or anywhere else. Then we will see results.

17203337659.text: The #G8 and #G20 were productive. We discussed important issues for everyone: drug trafficking, the environment, nuclear safety and finance.
